recipesJson.name: Taco Tuesday
recipesJson.author: RedWagonVapes
recipesJson.description: This is a v3 recipe not fully tested saw this profile while scrolling through Facebook its a apple cheesecake taco

reviews.text: An Apple Cinnamon Cheesecake Taco sounds like an amazing thing that needs to get in my belly.  Unfortunately, I get both a touch of seriously artificial plasticky maple notes from the WF Sugar Cone in there, marring the otherwise wonderful apple-cinnamon cheesecake. Love this idea, but I think the WF Sugar Cone needs to be reduced in % or replaced with something else.
